chapters.title: Chapter 24:  To Make a Stand
chapters.info: Lamgwin Dorn, p. 397—Breane's boyfriend, a hard, bulky man from Caemlyn. He lived as a street thug, but was loyal to his queen. He joined Morgase when she left the country, and has since become Perrin's bodyservant. He was captured by the Whitecloaks, so Denton has taken over his duties for the time being. See also Taborwin, Breane.
